blocks.body: Founded in 2001, Julia Studio began with a simple belief: great design should feel effortless. Over 25 years, Julia has built a practice renowned for creating spaces that are beautiful, functional, and deeply personal.
blocks.bodyCn: Julia Studio 成立于2001年，源于一个简单的信念：优秀的设计应该感觉毫不费力。25年来，Julia 打造了一个以创造美观、实用且极具个性化空间而闻名的设计工作室。

blocks.body: With over 1,000 projects completed — spanning luxury homes, corporate offices, art exhibitions, and commercial spaces — our team brings depth of experience that few studios can match.
blocks.bodyCn: 完成超过1,000个项目——涵盖豪华住宅、企业办公室、艺术展览和商业空间——我们的团队拥有极少数工作室能比拟的丰富经验。

philosophy.headline: Design Philosophy
philosophy.body: We believe that every space has a story waiting to be told. Our approach begins with listening — understanding how you live, work, and dream. From there, we craft environments that honor your vision while introducing elements of surprise and delight.
philosophy.bodyCn: 我们相信每个空间都有一个等待被讲述的故事。我们的方法从倾听开始——了解您的生活方式、工作方式和梦想。在此基础上，我们打造尊重您愿景的环境，同时融入惊喜与愉悦的元素。

members.name: Julia
members.title: Founder & Creative Director
members.bio: With 25 years of design experience spanning residential, commercial, and exhibition spaces, Julia brings an unparalleled eye for creating timeless interiors.
members.bioCn: 拥有25年跨越住宅、商业和展览空间的设计经验，Julia 拥有创造永恒室内设计的无与伦比的眼光。

members.name: Alex Chen
members.title: Design Director
members.bio: Specializing in commercial and exhibition spaces, Alex brings a fresh perspective and meticulous attention to spatial planning.
members.bioCn: 专注于商业和展览空间，Alex 为空间规划带来全新视角和一丝不苟的关注。

members.name: Marcus Lee
members.title: Construction Manager
members.bio: With 15 years of construction expertise, Marcus ensures every design detail is executed with precision and craft.
members.bioCn: 拥有15年施工专业经验，Marcus 确保每个设计细节都以精准和工艺执行。

milestones.event: Julia Studio founded in New York
